judges: Before Mitchell, Dean, Fell, Brown, Mestrezat and Potter, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Fell,
The appellee in this case is the father of the appellee in Winters v. Boll, ante, p. 41, in which case an opinion has been filed. For the reasons there stated the judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Fell,

attorneys: William M. Hargest of Hargest $■ Hargest, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Winters v. Boll, Appellant
(No. 2).
Argued June 3, 1902.
Appeal, No. 13, May T., 1902, by defendant, from judgment of C. P. Dauphin Co., Sept. T., 1899, No. 362, on verdict for plaintiff in case of William L. Winters by his father and next friend, Thomas J. Winters, and Thomas J. Winters, in his own right, v. Boll Brothers Manufacturing Company.
Before Mitchell, Dean, Fell, Brown, Mestrezat and Potter, JJ.
Affirmed.
Verdict and judgment for plaintiff for SI,042. Defendant appealed.
O. II. Bergner, for appellant.
William M. Hargest of Hargest $■ Hargest, for appellee.
October 13, 1902:
